QuestData.Title: Brood of Evil
QuestData.Description: This egg you recovered is an alarming sign, $n. The Twilight dragons are usually raised from stolen eggs from other dragonflights, which are then modified through dark magic.$B$BThis "natural" egg is evidence that one of their matriarchs has become a viable broodmother. We must destroy her before her brood spreads.$B$BGo to the Ascendant's Rise where they claim these aberrations are kept and slay one of the juvenile drakes. We will use its skull to lure out its mother.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Young Twilight Drake's Skull at the Ascendant's Rise in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, $n. We will use this to draw out the Twilight matriarch.
